name: Paris
description: Paris, the City of Light, is famous for its iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.

itineraries.name: Morning Exploration
itineraries.description: Embark on a morning exploration of Paris. Begin with an authentic Parisian breakfast in a local café, then delve into art at the Louvre Museum. Enjoy a leisurely stroll in the beautiful Tuileries Gardens and learn about history at Place de la Concorde. Wrap up your morning with shopping along the elegant Champs-Élysées.

itineraries.name: Parisian Charm in Half a Day
itineraries.description: Explore the highlights of Paris in just half a day. Start with breathtaking views from the Eiffel Tower, followed by a relaxing Seine River cruise to admire the city's iconic landmarks. Dive into the bohemian atmosphere of Montmartre, visit the iconic Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and soak in panoramic vistas.

name: New York
description: New York City is a bustling metropolis known for its diverse neighborhoods, world-class museums, and iconic skyline.

itineraries.name: Morning in Manhattan
itineraries.description: Make the most of your morning in Manhattan. Begin with a delightful breakfast at a local café. Then, visit the American Museum of Natural History for a fascinating journey through nature and science. Conclude with a scenic walk along the High Line Park, admiring Hudson River views

itineraries.name: Half-Day Manhattan Exploration
itineraries.description: Discover the best of Manhattan in half a day. Start with stunning views from the Empire State Building, then explore rich history at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through Central Park and finish off in the vibrant bustle of Times Square

name: Barcelona
description: Barcelona is known for its unique architecture, beautiful beaches, and vibrant arts and culinary scenes.

itineraries.name: Morning in Barcelona
itineraries.description: Barcelona is a city brimming with history, art, and culture. This itinerary will take you through some of its most iconic places, offering a taste of the city's unique charm

name: Rio de Janeiro
description: Rio de Janeiro boasts stunning beaches, lush landscapes, and the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue.

itineraries.name: Discovering Rio de Janeiro in One Day
itineraries.description: Rio de Janeiro is famous for its iconic beaches, majestic mountains, and rich culture. This itinerary will take you through some of its most memorable spots, providing a taste of the city's unique charm

name: Bangkok
description: Bangkok is a city of contrasts, with bustling street markets, ornate temples, and a lively nightlife.

itineraries.name: Exploring Bangkok's Culture
itineraries.description: This itinerary will take you through some of Bangkok's cultural highlights in a shorter timeframe.

itineraries.name: Modern Bangkok Experience
itineraries.description: This itinerary will introduce you to the modern and bustling side of Bangkok.

name: Cape Town
description: Cape Town offers breathtaking natural beauty, including Table Mountain and stunning coastal landscapes.

itineraries.name: Cape Town Coastal Adventure
itineraries.description: Experience the natural beauty and vibrant culture of Cape Town's stunning coastline in just half a day. This itinerary will take you on a memorable journey along the city's most scenic spots.

name: Sydney
description: Sydney is famous for its iconic Opera House, beautiful harbor, and vibrant cultural scene.

itineraries.name: Sydney Harbour Highlights
itineraries.description: Discover the beauty of Sydney Harbour in just a few hours. This itinerary will take you to iconic landmarks and provide breathtaking views of the city's stunning harbor.

name: Istanbul
description: Istanbul bridges two continents, offering a mix of rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant markets.

itineraries.name: Istanbul's Historic Charm
itineraries.description: Experience the rich history of Istanbul in just a few hours. This itinerary will take you to iconic historic sites, allowing you to immerse yourself in the city's cultural heritage.

itineraries.name: Istanbul Bosphorus Delight
itineraries.description: Explore the beauty of the Bosphorus in Istanbul during a short trip. This itinerary will take you on a scenic journey along the Bosphorus, showcasing the city's unique waterfront views.

name: Copenhagen
description: Copenhagen is known for its bike-friendly streets, innovative design, and cozy hygge lifestyle.

itineraries.name: Copenhagen Waterfront Serenity
itineraries.description: Discover the tranquility of Copenhagen's waterfront during a short trip. This itinerary will guide you through scenic spots along the waterfront, offering picturesque views of the city.

itineraries.name: Copenhagen Cultural Stroll
itineraries.description: Immerse yourself in Copenhagen's rich culture and history in just a few hours. This itinerary will take you to iconic cultural landmarks, providing a glimpse into the city's vibrant heritage.

name: Petra
description: The ancient city of Petra is a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its impressive rock-cut architecture and history.

itineraries.name: Ancient Wonders
itineraries.description: Embark on a journey through the timeless city of Petra in Jordan. This itinerary will guide you through the archaeological treasures of Petra, allowing you to marvel at its ancient wonders.

itineraries.name: Scenic Views
itineraries.description: Experience the stunning natural beauty of Petra during a short visit. This itinerary will take you on a scenic trail through Petra, showcasing its breathtaking landscapes.

name: Venice
description: Venice is a romantic city of canals, known for its historic architecture and unique waterways.

itineraries.name: Canal Tour
itineraries.description: Explore the romantic city of Venice on a canal tour. This itinerary will guide you through the picturesque canals and historic sites of Venice, offering a glimpse into its unique charm.

itineraries.name: Art and Culture
itineraries.description: Immerse yourself in the art and culture of Venice in a few hours. This itinerary will take you to renowned cultural spots, allowing you to appreciate Venice's artistic heritage.

name: Prague
description: Prague is a fairy-tale city with stunning castles, charming streets, and a rich cultural heritage.

itineraries.name: Castle and History
itineraries.description: Discover the rich history of Prague through a visit to Prague Castle. This itinerary will guide you through the castle complex and its historic surroundings, offering insights into the city's past.

name: Cancun
description: Cancun is a tropical paradise with beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and ancient Mayan ruins.

itineraries.name: Beach Paradise
itineraries.description: Experience the beauty of Cancún's stunning beaches and crystal-clear waters. This itinerary will take you to the best beach spots in Cancún, offering relaxation and water activities.

name: Rome
description: Rome, the Eternal City, is steeped in history and is home to ancient ruins, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine.

itineraries.name: Eternal City Highlights
itineraries.description: Explore the timeless beauty of Rome's historic sites. This itinerary will take you to iconic landmarks, allowing you to immerse yourself in the rich history of the Eternal City.

name: Tokyo
description: Tokyo is a vibrant city blending modern technology with traditional culture, offering unique experiences around every corner.

itineraries.name: Modern Metropolis Tour
itineraries.description: Experience the futuristic vibes of Tokyo's modern cityscape. This itinerary will take you to high-tech districts, showcasing Tokyo's cutting-edge technology and vibrant culture.
